scripts.pretest: if exist cypress\reports; then rmdir /S/Q cypress\reports; fi;
scripts.posttest: npm run cy:run || npm run generate:report
scripts.tag:stable:local: xvfb-run cypress run --env environmentName=local --headed --browser chrome -e tags='@stable_test'
scripts.tag:stable:dev: xvfb-run cypress run --env environmentName=dev --headed --browser chrome -e tags='@stable_test'
scripts.tag:stable:staging: xvfb-run cypress run --env environmentName=staging --headed --browser chrome -e tags='@stable_test'
scripts.tag:stable:pr:dev: cypress run --env environmentName=dev --browser chrome -e tags='@pr and @stable_test'
scripts.tag:stable:pr:staging: cypress run --env environmentName=staging --browser chrome -e tags='@pr and @stable_test'
scripts.tag:stable:pr:ci: cypress run --env environmentName=ci --browser chrome -e tags='@pr and @stable_test'
scripts.tag:stable:release:dev: cypress run --env environmentName=dev --browser chrome -e tags='@release and @stable_test'
scripts.tag:stable:release:staging: cypress run --env environmentName=staging --browser chrome -e tags='@release and @stable_test'
scripts.tag:stable:release:ci: cypress run --env environmentName=ci --browser chrome -e tags='@release and @stable_test'
